name: welling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
well
(of liquid) to appear on the surface of something or come slowly out from somewhere: Dirty water welled (up) out of the damaged pipe. As she read the letter tears welled up in her eyes.figurative Conflicting emotions welled up in his heart. Synonym
swell
